mapper.select: SELECT q.QUESTION_ID, q.USER_ID, q.TITLE, q.CONTENT AS QNA_CONTENT, q.CREATED_AT AS QNA_CREATED_AT, q.VIEWS, a.QUESTION_ID AS question_answer, a.CONTENT AS ANSWER_CONTENT, a.CREATED_AT AS ANSWER_CREATED_AT, a.UPDATED_AT FROM QUESTION q LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSWER a ON q.QUESTION_ID = a.QUESTION_ID ORDER BY q.QUESTION_ID DESC, q.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT q.QUESTION_ID, q.USER_ID, q.TITLE, q.CONTENT AS QNA_CONTENT, q.CREATED_AT AS QNA_CREATED_AT, q.VIEWS, a.QUESTION_ID AS question_answer, a.CONTENT AS ANSWER_CONTENT, a.CREATED_AT AS ANSWER_CREATED_AT, a.UPDATED_AT FROM QUESTION q LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSWER a ON q.QUESTION_ID = a.QUESTION_ID WHERE q.QUESTION_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION (USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
